system.description:
You have combined a strong ideological commitment with a tremendous amount of martial training. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Dexterity, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your herald levels count as fighter levels for the purposes of the fighter’s @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.g4s2uymxnkn0y0yf]{Extra Attack} feature. 
  • As an action, you can exchange a number of exertion points up to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1) for Lay on Hands pool at a rate of 1 point of exertion for 2 points of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.my42mip0qc35rcp2]{Lay on Hands}. You cannot perform this conversion in reverse, and once you have used this benefit, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.
  • Your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.01szspr1nunp0lql]{Divine Sense} enhances your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.25vr449svc15tmv6]{Steely Mien} choice:
    • If you selected @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.yrwulntom1tgbfcy]{Closed Helm}, you have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened by creatures you have selected to sense with Divine Sense. 
    • If you selected @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.h1g360gaaodfujmr]{Heroic Flair}, if a friendly creature within 60 feet of you fails a saving throw against an effect that would make it frightened, you can use your reaction to make a Persuasion check with an expertise die against the DC of the effect. If you exceed the DC, the creature is not frightened.
    • If you selected @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.gps1jbpps9trpk1w]{Watchful Eye}, you gain blindsight with a range of 10 feet.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in fighter, 3 levels in herald
